pages.text: Now that you have $(thing)Plastic,$() you will need to create $(item)Attuned Titanium.$()$(p)This alloy must be made in an $(thing)Upgraded Electric Purifier.$() See $(l:items/upgrades#purifierfiltering)Filtering Upgrade$(/l) for more information.
Place $(thing)1 Ender Pearl and 1 Mystium Blend$() as the filter items, and $(item)1 Pure Titanium Ingot$() in the main spot, to get $(9)1 Attuned Titanium Ingot.$()

Create $(thing)Flerovium Ingots$() by placing a Mystium Block near an Entropy Reactor that is above at least 50% $(4)Entropy$(), and with time, the Mystium Block will become a $(thing)Flerovium Block.

You can also use world corruption via the Entropy Reactor to create a $(3)Prism Rose.$() Just place any small flower, like a Poppy or Dandelion, near the reactor to receive a Prism Rose.$(p)Use a Grinder with a Prism Rose to create a $(item)Prismatic Dust.$()

Now, we can start putting it all together to get the final alloy available to you: $(9)Novasteel.$()$(p)Combine 1 Flerovium Ingot and 1 Attuned Titanium Ingot in an Alloy Smelter to get 2 Raw Novasteel Compound.
Combine 1 Mystium Blend and 1 Prismatic Dust in a Fluid Mixer with Condensed Void to receive 2 Nova Blend.

Finally, combine 1 Raw Novasteel Compound and 1 Nova Blend in an Alloy Smelter to receive $(9)1 Novasteel Ingot.$()$(p)Having trouble mass-producing Flerovium for this setup? Try the $(l:blocks/entropy_reactor#entropicharnesser)Entropic Harnesser Upgrade.$(/l)

With $(thing)Novasteel Ingots$() under your belt, you have reached the end of the Synthetic Age, and the structured tutorial. However, this is by no means the end of the mod, as there are still many things to do and machines to make.$(p)$(l)Thank you for playing Assembly Line Machines!
